short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect Youtube shorts to normal player, so that user can use forward/backward option.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will redirects Youtube shorts to Normal Player.
This allows users to use functionality like forward, backward for Youtube shorts video too.
